channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Mehran Waheed
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Mehran Waheed

item.title: Project I: Sunspot and sunflares
item.description: Project Description: In this project, I delved into the fascinating realm of solar flare prediction, leveraging data on sunspots and solar flares. The goal was to develop a robust model capable of forecasting severe solar flares, with a particular focus on X-class flares. Key Steps and Achievements: Data Exploration and Cleaning: Conducted thorough exploratory data analysis (EDA) to understand patterns in sunspot data. Merged sunspot and solar flare datasets, enhancing the richness of information.

item.title: Project II: Load Forecasting
item.description: Project Overview The Electric Load Forecasting project aimed to predict future electric load consumption, a critical aspect for efficient energy management. The project underwent thorough exploratory data analysis (EDA) to gain insights into the dataset, followed by various preprocessing steps to prepare the data for modeling. To optimize the performance of the predictive models, a grid search cross-validation approach was employed to fine-tune hyperparameters. Three distinct models, namely Random Forest, Decision Tree, and Feed Forward Neural Network, were evaluated.

item.title: About
item.description: As a data science enthusiast, I am passionate about exploring the world of analytics and solving complex real-world problems using data-driven insights. I am a quick learner and love to acquire new skills and knowledge to enhance my expertise in this rapidly evolving field. I have gained hands-on experience in data preprocessing, data modeling, and data visualization using various programming languages and tools such as Python, R, SQL, and Tableau. I have also worked on projects involving machine learning.
